txt.en: 'Those trinkets of yours will make fine trophies, [placeholder]!'
'This one is mine, but a share of gold to whoever kills the others!'
'We Three that remain cannot control the Corcur and all the broods of Zaudru and Thorog!'
'You will learn that Storvâgûn has other friends in high places....'
'They will not lay a hand on you, little Man, but I made no such promise....'
'The Thunder-lord can keep Iorbar! Storvâgûn and the true giants will rule Helegrod!'
'The alliance must be preserved! Gather your people and descend into Helegrod at once!'
'Storvâgûn will snap your barter-sticks if you do not fight, cowards!'
'You are garbed in the riches of Angmar and still you dare to demand more, giant?'
'The dwarf-city does not belong to Storvâgûn, little Man.'
'If it did, perhaps then I would care for its troubles.'
'You may have frightened the robed Men, little folk, but they are not as strong as me!'
The Yule Festival must be underway in order to play this Festivity.
'You puny, little folk are not like Storvâgûn! When the snows come....'
'They are here! So be it. Protect me from these invaders, and Helegrod will be yours!'
